remarks: Axiom of Choice expressed with the fewest number of different variables.  The penultimate step shows the logical equivalence to ~ ax-ac .  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-2003.)
statement:
zfac $p |- E. x A. y A. z ( ( y e. z /\ z e. w ) -> E. w A. y ( E. w ( ( y e. z /\ z e. w ) /\ ( y e. w /\ w e. x ) ) <-> y = w ) ) $.
$d w x y z $.
